### Goal of the experiment
The goal of this second experiment was to measure the effect of staggering on multiple object tracking.

### Experimental Program (zip archive)

To run the experiment, unzip the [archive](https://github.com/fannychevalier/staggered-animation/blob/master/The%20Not%20So%20Staggering%20Effect%20of%20Staggered%20Animations%20-%20Experiment%202.zip) and run the Java executable `Experiment1.jar`.

You need to have [Java](https://www.java.com/en/download/) installed on your computer.
